So this is, admittedly, a minor issue at best if you know your way around Quests tabs/use the code view. However I've noticed that the headers for the attribute and type boxes in the "Attributes" tabs on objects is clipping behind the boxes themselves, partially obscuring the text. I'm not sure if this is a glitch with the current version of Quest itself, or if this is due to my computer, but I felt pointing it out might be beneficial if anyone else is having this issue.

For clarity's sake, I'm running Windows 10 Pro on 3840 x 2160 resolution with a 300% scale. 

Has anyone else had this issue and have you found any solutions?

"3840 x 2160 resolution with a 300% scale."...
WOW!!!... You must have a large monitor to get that kind of resolution!!!
I only get 1920x1080 on a 27" screen...
I bet it is an issue of blowing up from that HIGH resolution...
Try backing the resolution down by half and setting the scale to 100% and see what happens.
